law.catch_line: Judicial districts with two District Judges and two numbered divisions.
law.text:
The following judicial districts are entitled to two (2) District Judges and shall have two (2) numbered divisions of the District Court:
Second Judicial District.
Third Judicial District.
Fourth Judicial District.
Ninth Judicial District.
Eleventh Judicial District.
Twelfth Judicial District.
Thirteenth Judicial District.
Fourteenth Judicial District.
Fifteenth Judicial District.
Seventeenth Judicial District.
Twenty-first Judicial District.
Twenty-fourth Judicial District.
Twenty-seventh Judicial District.
Twenty-eighth Judicial District.
Thirty-first Judicial District.
Thirty-second Judicial District.
Thirty-fourth Judicial District.
Thirty-fifth Judicial District.
Thirty-eighth Judicial District.
Fortieth Judicial District.
Forty-first Judicial District.
Forty-sixth Judicial District.
Forty-eighth Judicial District.
Fifty-first Judicial District.
Fifty-third Judicial District.
Fifty-fourth Judicial District.
Fifty-fifth Judicial District.
Fifty-sixth Judicial District.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 250, Pt. V, sec. 4, effective January 1, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts. ch. 173, Pt. XIII, 1.(3), sec. 4, effective January 1, 2007. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 9, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 3, effective June 21, 2001. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 541, sec. 4, effective July 1, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 517, secs. 7 and 12, effective September 1, 1998, September 1, 1999, and January 1, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986; and ch. 274, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 311, sec. 2, effective January 6, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 247, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 4.

metadata.lrc-note: (1/1/2007). 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 250, Pt. V, sec. 6, provides that the new judgeships created by Sections 1 to 3 of that Part shall become effective January 1, 2007. The revisions to this statute in that Act supersede those made in 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 173, Pt. XIII, 1.(3), sec. 4, which were also to be effective January 1, 2007. That 2005 version of the statute was used as the base document for the 2006 revisions.
